data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Spezia.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
Fiorentina move into a 0-1 lead through a German Pezzella header.
In the minute 2, Cristiano Biraghi instrumental with a fine assist.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cristiano Biraghi puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
In the minute 4, Great play from Pol Lirola to set up the goal.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Spezia.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 13, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
Spezia to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
Free kick Fiorentina.
Fiorentina drive upfield and Nikola Milenkovic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Spezia defender.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Fiorentina drives forward and Nikola Milenkovic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a Spezia throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
In the minute 19, Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Fiorentina advance rapidly upfield but Gianluca Manganiello blows for offside.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Free kick Spezia.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In La Spezia, Roberto Piccoli of Spezia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 27, Gianluca Manganiello awards the away team a throw-in.
Dusan Vlahovic (Fiorentina) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Spezia have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Spezia's Daniele Verde gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
Spezia are pushing forward but Matteo Ricci's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 28, Gianluca Manganiello awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a Spezia throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 32, Simone Bastoni (Spezia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Spezia.
Spezia push forward at Stadio Alberto Picco and Daniele Verde gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fiorentina defence.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Throw-in Spezia.
Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Fiorentina.
Daniele Verde keeps the home team in the match by reducing the deficit to 1-2.
Claudio Terzi with an assist there.
In the minute 42, At Stadio Alberto Picco, Fiorentina are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
Pol Lirola (Fiorentina) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 45, Spezia have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Alessandro Deiola (Spezia) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half is underway in La Spezia.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 47, Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gianluca Manganiello awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 49, Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in La Spezia.
Goal kick for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 51, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spezia to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Spezia are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Vincenzo Italiano is making the team's first substitution at Stadio Alberto Picco with M'bala Nzola replacing Roberto Piccoli.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Fiorentina!
In the minute 59, Julian Chabot (Spezia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Fiorentina push forward at Stadio Alberto Picco and Gaetano Castrovilli gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Spezia defence.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 62, Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Spezia.
Important block from the Spezia defence as Dusan Vlahovic fires in a strike for Fiorentina.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Salva Ferrer is replacing Jacopo Sala for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 65, Kevin Agudelo is replacing Alessandro Deiola for the home team.
The home team have replaced Daniele Verde with Diego Farias. This is the fourth substitution made today by Vincenzo Italiano.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Giacomo Bonaventura (Fiorentina) gets a yellow card.
Gianluca Manganiello awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 68, Diego Farias of Spezia gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Fiorentina at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Fiorentina drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 69, In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Gianluca Manganiello awards Spezia a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Gianluca Manganiello waits before resuming play because German Pezzella for Fiorentina is still down.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
German Pezzella (Fiorentina) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Igor.
Giuseppe Iachini (Fiorentina) is making a second substitution, with Patrick Cutrone replacing Dusan Vlahovic.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Spezia.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
In the minute 75, Goal! Diego Farias equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a Spezia throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 78, Giuseppe Iachini is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Alberto Picco with Erick Pulgar replacing Gaetano Castrovilli.
Jose Callejon is on a sub for Giacomo Bonaventura for Fiorentina.
Cristian Dell`Orco is replacing Simone Bastoni for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 79, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Spezia's Gennaro Acampora breaks free at Stadio Alberto Picco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in La Spezia.
Corner awarded to Spezia.
In the minute 82, Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
In La Spezia, Cristiano Biraghi of Fiorentina is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
In the minute 85, Fiorentina's Jose Callejon gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Spezia defender.
Free kick for Spezia in the half of Fiorentina.
At Stadio Alberto Picco, Pol Lirola has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 86, The away team replace Franck Ribery with Christian Kouame.
Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match at Stadio Alberto Picco has been interrupted briefly for a check on Matteo Ricci, who is down injured.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Spezia's Matteo Ricci is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Spezia have a goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in La Spezia.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Spezia push forward at Stadio Alberto Picco and Kevin Agudelo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fiorentina defence.
Spezia surge into the attack at Stadio Alberto Picco but M'bala Nzola’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gianluca Manganiello awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
The match is over. Final score 2-2.
